Diploma.PLO1: Demonstrate foundational knowledge and understanding of basic concepts, principles, and practices in the discipline responsibly.
Diploma.PLO2: Apply basic critical and logical thinking to identify and solve routine problems ethically.
Diploma.PLO3: Perform simple practical or technical tasks safely and responsibly under supervision.
Diploma.PLO4: Demonstrate teamwork, empathy, and respectful interaction in supervised group settings.
Diploma.PLO5: Communicate simple ideas clearly and respectfully in written, oral, and digital forms.
Diploma.PLO6: Use common digital tools and technologies safely and responsibly for basic tasks.
Diploma.PLO7: Apply basic mathematical or numerical techniques accurately and honestly.
Diploma.PLO8: Demonstrate initiative and responsibility in supervised tasks or group activities.
Diploma.PLO9: Demonstrate self-management, discipline, and a positive attitude toward personal growth.
Diploma.PLO10: Show basic creativity and responsibility in identifying simple opportunities or improvements.
Diploma.PLO11: Demonstrate awareness of ethical behaviour, honesty, and responsible conduct.

Degree.PLO1: Apply comprehensive disciplinary knowledge and theoretical understanding responsibly in professional contexts.
Degree.PLO2: Use critical, analytical, and creative thinking to solve moderately complex problems ethically.
Degree.PLO3: Perform technical, practical, or clinical procedures competently and safely according to professional standards.
Degree.PLO4: Demonstrate effective teamwork, empathy, respect, and constructive interpersonal communication.
Degree.PLO5: Communicate effectively and respectfully to diverse audiences using appropriate written, oral, and digital methods.
Degree.PLO6: Use digital tools and technologies responsibly, ethically, and effectively to support professional tasks.
Degree.PLO7: Apply quantitative reasoning and statistical techniques accurately and accountably in problem solving.
Degree.PLO8: Demonstrate leadership, responsibility, and positive influence in completing tasks or managing small groups.
Degree.PLO9: Demonstrate self-regulation, resilience, professionalism, and commitment to lifelong learning.
Degree.PLO10: Demonstrate entrepreneurial thinking, creativity, and initiative guided by social responsibility.
Degree.PLO11: Apply ethical principles, integrity, and professional values in decision-making and practice.

Master.PLO1: Integrate advanced knowledge and specialised understanding to address complex disciplinary or interdisciplinary challenges.
Master.PLO2: Apply advanced analytical, critical, and reflective thinking to propose ethical and effective solutions.
Master.PLO3: Execute advanced technical, practical, or clinical procedures with high proficiency and professional responsibility.
Master.PLO4: Demonstrate advanced interpersonal skills, empathy, and collaboration in professional or multidisciplinary environments.
Master.PLO5: Communicate complex ideas clearly, persuasively, and respectfully to expert and non-expert audiences.
Master.PLO6: Use advanced digital tools, technologies, and data ethically and effectively for professional or research purposes.
Master.PLO7: Apply advanced quantitative, analytical, or modelling techniques with precision and accountability.
Master.PLO8: Demonstrate leadership, initiative, and ethical influence in managing complex tasks or teams.
Master.PLO9: Demonstrate autonomy, resilience, professionalism, and commitment to continuous personal and professional development.
Master.PLO10: Create or evaluate innovative, responsible, and sustainable solutions to complex challenges or opportunities.
Master.PLO11: Demonstrate advanced ethical reasoning, integrity, and professional judgement in complex situations.

PhD.PLO1: Generate new knowledge through systematic investigation and demonstrate authoritative understanding of disciplinary or interdisciplinary fields.
PhD.PLO2: Critically analyse, synthesise, and evaluate complex ideas to create innovative and ethical solutions or theoretical contributions.
PhD.PLO3: Perform specialised or novel practical, technical, or research procedures with high autonomy and scholarly rigour.
PhD.PLO4: Demonstrate advanced interpersonal, collaborative, and empathetic engagement in international or multidisciplinary contexts.
PhD.PLO5: Communicate complex research findings or expert knowledge effectively, respectfully, and persuasively at international standards.
PhD.PLO6: Use advanced digital technologies, data analytics, and research tools ethically and proficiently in generating new knowledge.
PhD.PLO7: Apply sophisticated quantitative, statistical, or modelling techniques accurately, transparently, and with scholarly accountability.
PhD.PLO8: Provide intellectual, ethical, and strategic leadership in disciplinary or professional domains.
PhD.PLO9: Demonstrate intellectual independence, resilience, professionalism, and lifelong scholarly commitment.
PhD.PLO10: Create or lead innovative, responsible, and sustainable ventures or solutions with societal or global impact.
PhD.PLO11: Demonstrate the highest standards of ethics, integrity, responsible conduct, and scholarly stewardship.

SCmapping.PLO1: SC1.1 Subject Knowledge, SC1.2 Conceptual Understanding
SCmapping.PLO2: SC2.1 Analysis, SC2.2 Evaluation, SC2.3 Problem-Solving
SCmapping.PLO3: SC3.1 Technical Skills, SC3.2 Safety Practice
SCmapping.PLO5: SC5.1 Oral, SC5.2 Written, SC5.3 Digital Communication
SCmapping.PLO6: SC6.1 Digital Tools, SC6.2 Data Handling
